name: WeatherLib
body:
### Welcome to WeatherLib WeatherLibary is a c# library that provides your app weather service from all over the world. By entering the request location you can get the weather right away. ### Easy to install: Just Download and add reference from your original project. log4net package is required(Nuget packages). ### Simple to use: ************************************************************************************************************************** var location = new Location(Console.ReadLine());
OpenWeatherMapService.SetKey("key from the web service- for example openweathermap");
var service = WeatherDataServiceFactory.GetWeatherDataService(WeatherDataServiceFactory.OPEN_WEATHER_MAP); var data = service.GetWeatherData(location);
************************************************************************************************************************** Log file: Weather/sample/bin/debug/OpenWeatherMapService.txt ### Authors and Contributors Tom Yahav tommyahav@gmail.com Almog Asulin almogassu@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
